## EDA

```{r}
cases_nsw_raw_delay_long %>% 
    group_by(delay_type) %>% 
    count(days, sort = TRUE) %>% 
    mutate(prop = n / sum(n))
  
  
    ggplot(aes(x = days)) + 
    geom_histogram(binwidth = 1) + 
    facet_wrap(~delay_type)
```



## Analysis

```{r show-trace-run}
scenario_df_run 
```

```{r}

  cases_nsw_delays %>% 
    group_by(period) %>% 
    summarise(
      across(
        .cols = c(
          test_turnaround_time,
          time_to_interview,
          full_contact_delay
          ),
        .fns = mean
        )
    )
  
  cases_nsw_delays %>% 
    select(test_turnaround_time,
           time_to_interview,
           full_contact_delay,
           period) %>% 
    pivot_longer(
      cols = -period,
      names_to = "delay_type",
      values_to = "days"
    ) %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x = days)) +
    geom_bar() + 
    facet_grid(period~delay_type)
  
```
